Chinese Stir Fry

Chinese Stir Fry

This recipe does really well if you add garlic to the vegetables, use celery and yellow noodles to counter the greens (broccolini), orange (carrots), red (pepper).

Ingredients

  1. Stir Fry Noodles
  2. Protein
    • Tofu or,
    • Chicken or,
    • Shrimp
  3. Vegetables
    • Celery (!)
    • Broccolini
    • Carrots (julienne)
    • Red Pepper
  4. Garlic
  5. Stir Fry Sauce
    • Soy Sauce (1 tbsp)
    • Golden Soy Sauce (1 tbsp)
    • Oyster Sauce (1 tbsp)
    • Sesame Oil (1/2 tbsp)

Instructions

  1. Cut up the vegetables and make the sauce
  2. Lightly fry the vegetables in a wok with oil and garlic
  3. At the same time
    • bleach the noodles for 3 minutes
    • fry the meat in a different pan
  4. Mix all three together

Modifications

  1. Add lime juice to bring out the flavor
